description: Rapid Photo Downloader is an essential part of my Linux photography workflow. It renames all my photos, creates subfolders and even backups my photos during the download.
summary: RPD is an Excellent Photography App!

description: I was using the Rapid Photo Downloader for importing and renaming JPG+RAW images for at least a year. I constantly stumbled over serious bugs in the basic funtionality: the importer stops working at some photos without any feedback of what is going on, when setting the photo download subfolders to "/" (i.e. I do not want subfolders) the importer hangs, sometimes the "close" button in the preferences dialogue does not work, the importer cannot read from a locally mounted network location. I replaced the tool with a command line one-liner using "exiftool" to rename photos.
Las opciones son minimalistas y es súper eficaz en lo que hace.
Vraiment bien pensé. Merci aux développeurs.

Il semblerait qu'un module pyhton absent de fedora 28 empêche l'installation de ce logiciel.
